display_long_description:
🚀 Dear Space Explorer,

Thank you for your patience and support! We know you've been waiting for updates on the Space Explorers app on Meta Quest, and we truly appreciate your understanding.

🌌 Exciting news: A brand-new Space Explorers Mixed Reality app is launching later this spring for Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S audiences! 

Look for our new and updated product page coming soon, where you will be able to download the improved experience. We will no longer be supporting and updating the current (legacy) app, but our improved version will have much more to offer.

Get ready to experience:

🎥 Upgraded Cinematic VR: Your favorite content is now in stunning 8K resolution, offering unmatched clarity, presence, and realism.

🪐 Mixed Reality Features: Unlock artifacts, such as models of the ISS and Saturn V Spacecraft, and see them come to life in zero-gravity within your own home.

🌕 Exclusive New Content: Discover the latest chapter in the Space Explorers series, Mission to the Moon, chronicling humanity’s ambitious return to the lunar surface through the Artemis missions.

📅 Mark your calendar! Our Coming Soon campaign begins during Space Week in early May. Stay tuned for details and add the new app to your wish list to be the first to experience this groundbreaking adventure!

And remember, the Space Explorers cinematic VR content is always free on Meta Quest TV.

We can’t wait for you to experience the new Space Explorers MR app!

With gratitude,
The Felix & Paul Studios Team 🌠
